attributes.action: Make all councils ,plant at least one tree, on ALL green spaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With global warming ,in the headlines, and with knowing about this during the 80s, its time the government, did more than telling us all about reducing ,our footprint,we need more trees, to help reduce the carbon , which is already in our atmosphere.so we want more trees planted in our green spaces, which will also, help with our rainfall, as the trees will help soak up the water.
   We need , and want at least one tree ,to every green space ,in every city, town, and, village, and the councils should be made to do this.
